Posts.Content: Aug 22, 2016 03:22AM menelao wrote: Hi, Just want to add that worrying and stress is bad for your health. Focus on everyday life, take a long walk in the Park, spend 10 min a day on a free meditation on a cell app Like headspace. You can do things to prevent recurrence: Limit your drinks to 3/week or less Exercise 3 times a week (check free programs for cancer survivors at the YMCA) Walk everyday Eat Mediterranean diet
Posts.Title: Stage 1 and struggling KathyL624 gkbuser
